runJbig2enc

public static void runJbig2enc(java.lang.String jbig2enc,
                               java.util.List<java.lang.String> imageList,
                               double defaultThresh,
                               java.lang.Boolean autoThresh,
                               int bwThresh,
                               java.lang.Boolean silent)
                        throws PdfRecompressionException
run jbig2enc with symbol coding used and output in format suitable for PDF

Parameters:
defaultThresh - what thresholding value should be used
autoThresh - if improvement of jbig2enc should be used
bwThresh - setting black/white thresholding
silent - turns off error output
jbig2enc - represents path to jbig2enc
imageList - list of images to be compressed
Throws:
PdfRecompressionException
